title: Old Atari Games Found In N.M. Landfill
teaser: E.T. was a hit in the 80s, not so for the video game based on the film. It was rumored Atari dumped truckloads of unused game cartridges in a landfill. Three decades later, the games were found.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
